name: Family Xcapes
description:
Your spaceship is under attack and you have only 3 minutes to rescue your family and escape alive

Use arrow keys or W-A-S-D to move.

Put the characters over the floor' switches to open doors and rescue the whole family. Be quick!

Made it with Löve in 2018, during June's  #1GAM Jam. Featuring the awesome music of Pocketmaster.
